countries.name: United States
countries.defaultNdc: Reduce economy-wide GHG emissions 50-52% below 2005 levels by 2030

countries.name: European Union
countries.defaultNdc: Reduce net GHG emissions at least 55% below 1990 levels by 2030

countries.name: China
countries.defaultNdc: Peak CO2 emissions before 2030 and achieve carbon neutrality before 2060

countries.name: India
countries.defaultNdc: Reduce emissions intensity of GDP by 45% by 2030 from 2005 level

countries.name: Ecuador
countries.defaultNdc: GHG reductions of 7% and additional reduction of 8% vs BAU

notes.normalization: When countries join, GDP weights are normalized so sum equals member count
